name: Model Robustness
description: A decision point for assessing the robustness of AI models against adversarial attacks.

values.name: None
values.description: No known vulnerability or a formally proven resistance to the specific threat.

values.name: Low
values.description: Low vulnerability with strong mitigation in place, but some minor weaknesses may still exist.

values.name: Medium
values.description: Moderate vulnerability with some mitigation, but significant weaknesses remain.

values.name: High
values.description: Severe vulnerability with little to no mitigation in place.
